sentence.Network_en: Restart play a goal - kick , and, next time, reconsider your positioning at throw - ins.
sentence.Network_cn: 以开球门球重新开始比赛, 同时, 下次在手抛球的时候注意自己的站位.

sentence.Network_en: Inter win their fourth corner of the second half. Recoba's cross goes out a goal kick.
sentence.Network_cn: 下半场的第四个角球,这一次雷科巴直接将球开出了底线,对方门球.

sentence.Network_en: They were still arguing the toss about the first goal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们仍在为第一个进球争论不休。

list.abs: 英语运动类单词_爱问知识人 ... corner ball,corner 角球 goal kick 球门球 ground ball,grounder 地面球.
英语运动类单词_爱问知识人 ... centre kick 中线发球 goal kick 球门发球 throw in,line-out 边线发球.
win by two goals以两球获胜kick a goal踢进一球knock sb. for a goal给某人以狠命的一击, 把某人打昏在地; 使某人酩酊大醉; 给.

means.word_mean: 1. (rugby) an attempt to kick a goal
2. (association football) a kick by the defending side after the attacking side sends the ball over the goal-line
